library(here)

## Simple linear regression

### Model fitting

Fit model:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
penguins_fit <- linear_reg() %>%
  set_engine("lm") %>%
  fit(body_mass_g ~ flipper_length_mm, data = penguins)
```

Tidy model output:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
tidy(penguins_fit)
```

Format model output as table:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
tidy(penguins_fit) %>%
  kable(digits = 3)
```

Augment data with model:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
augment(penguins_fit$fit)
```
